## Properties

| Property          | Attribute          | Description                                   | Type     | Default     |
| ----------------- | ------------------ | --------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `backgroundColor` | `background-color` | Background color                              | `string` | `'black'`   |
| `color`           | `color`            | Text color                                    | `string` | `'white'`   |
| `fontSize`        | `font-size`        | Font size                                     | `string` | `'inherit'` |
| `position`        | `position`         | Position of tooltip. left, right, top, bottom | `string` | `'top'`     |
| `text`            | `text`             | Text to be displayed in the tooltip           | `string` | `undefined` |
